titleStmt.title: Synodus Anglicana, or, The constitution and proceedings of an English convocation shown from the acts and registers thereof to be agreeable to the principles of an Episcopal church.
titleStmt.author: Gibson, Edmund, 1669-1748.

titleStmt.title: Synodus Anglicana, or, The constitution and proceedings of an English convocation shown from the acts and registers thereof to be agreeable to the principles of an Episcopal church.
titleStmt.author: Gibson, Edmund, 1669-1748.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. and J. Churchill,

notesStmt.note: "Appendix. I. Three registers of the upper-house in 1562 in which the xxxix articles were agreed upon, 1640, under Archb. Laud, 1661, &c. in which the Common-prayer was revis'd. 2. The two entire journals of the lower-house in 1586 and 1588."
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
